segments.text: I notice the boy is about to fall off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and the stool is already tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how reckless they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, and she doesn’t even see them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is going to crash any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would stop them before they hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making everything worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don’t know how the woman can be so oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think I’d yell at them if I were there.
segments.speaker: PAR
